column2: Gentlemen of the jury, order the prisoner to be released!	Gentlemen of the jury, order the prisoner to be released!
But, pardon me, you cannot understand what I am saying.
column3: But, pardon me, you cannot understand what I am saying.

column2: Do not, at least, condemn this man!
column3: Do not, at least, condemn this man!

column2: It was an impression which vanished speedily, but which was irresistible at the moment.
column3: It was an impression which vanished speedily, but which was irresistible at the moment.

column2: All of you, all who are present--consider me worthy of pity, do you not?	All of you, all who are present-consider me worthy of pity, do you not?
